name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: imgix Salesforce B2C Commerce Cloud Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C integration with imgix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C integration with imgix. 

With this extension, Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C users are able to easily browse for or search for images within their imgix Sources for use with their Products listings. For more details on setup and usage, please refer to our documentation here: https://docs.imgix.com/libraries/imgix-salesforce-commerce-cloud

To learn more about imgix, go to https://imgix.com.
